trans-unit.source: Monitors directories and file paths and notifies the cache of changes to the monitored items.
trans-unit.target: 监视目录和文件路径，并通知缓存被监视项的更改情况。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>类是的具体实现<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor>类型。

trans-unit.source: This class is sealed, therefore it cannot be extended.
trans-unit.target: 此类密封的因此不能进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: This class is useful if you want to use an existing cache implementation and to monitor files and directories for changes.
trans-unit.target: 此类很有用，如果你想要使用现有的缓存实现，并监视文件和目录的更改。

trans-unit.source: For each specified file or directory path, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class triggers a change notification if any of the following changes occur:
trans-unit.target: 为每个指定的文件或目录路径<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>类触发的更改通知，如果发生任何以下更改：

trans-unit.source: The name of the monitored file or directory changes.
trans-unit.target: 监视的文件或目录更改的名称。

trans-unit.source: The specified file or directory did not exist at the time the monitor was created, but was created later.
trans-unit.target: 在监视器已创建，但后来被创建时指定的文件或目录不存在。

trans-unit.source: In other words, a file or directory was created in the scope of the monitored items.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，文件或目录已在受监视项目的作用域中创建。

trans-unit.source: The size of a monitored file changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改被监视的文件的大小。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a monitored file changed, or the contents of a monitored directory changed.
trans-unit.target: 监视文件的内容发生更改，或受监视的目录的内容发生更改。

trans-unit.source: The access control list (ACL) of the file or directory was changed.
trans-unit.target: 已更改的文件或目录的访问控制列表 (ACL)。

trans-unit.source: The monitored file or directory was deleted.
trans-unit.target: 已删除监视的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: If too many changes occur for the monitored file or directory at the same time, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> instance can lose track of specific changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果在同一时间，未被监视的文件或目录发生太多更改<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>实例可能会失去对特定更改的跟踪。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class triggers a change notification.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>类触发的更改通知。

trans-unit.source: This scenario is more likely to occur when the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> instance monitors a directory, and many changes occur in the scope of the directory structure in a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况下是更有可能发生时<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>实例监视一个目录，并在短时间内的目录结构的作用域中发生许多更改。

trans-unit.source: Because the purpose of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class is only to signal that something has changed among the set of monitored files and directories, it is not considered important that details about a specific change are not captured.
trans-unit.target: 因为的用途<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>类是仅以发出信号中的一套监视的文件和目录内容有更改，它不被视为重要不捕获有关特定更改的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class is to provide notification that state changed so that a cache entry (or entries) can be evicted.
trans-unit.target: 用途<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>类旨在提供通知该状态更改，以便可以逐出缓存项 （或多个项）。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class does not indicate exactly what changed, internal-change tracking overflow is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>类并不表示什么更改的确切，内部更改跟踪溢出不起作用。

trans-unit.source: When you supply paths to a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> instance, the directory and file paths must be full paths to the directory or file.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供路径<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>实例、 目录和文件路径必须是目录或文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Relative paths and wildcard characters in paths are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允许相对路径和路径中的通配符字符。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class is used in an ASP.NET application, the Windows identity that is used for access to monitored items is the application identity for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>ASP.NET 应用程序中使用类，用于访问受监视项目的 Windows 标识为 ASP.NET 应用程序的应用程序标识。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the application identity will be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，则应用程序标识将为以下项之一：

trans-unit.source: The process identity.
trans-unit.target: 进程标识。

trans-unit.source: The configured application identity.
trans-unit.target: 配置应用程序标识。

trans-unit.source: The UNC credential if the application is running from a UNC share.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序运行从 UNC 共享的 UNC 凭据。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> class is used in a non-ASP.NET application, the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> class is used internally to monitor files.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>非 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用类<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>类在内部用于监视的文件。

trans-unit.source: As a result, whatever access control list (ACL) applies to a monitored file or directory is applied to the Windows identity of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 因此，任何访问控制列表 (ACL) 适用于受监视的文件或目录被应用于当前线程的 Windows 标识。

trans-unit.source: Callers must have the appropriate level of code access security (CAS) permissions and must have NTFS permissions to all monitored directories and paths.
trans-unit.target: 调用方必须具有适当级别的代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限，并且必须具有对所有受监视的目录和路径的 NTFS 权限。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a cache item that uses a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor> object to monitor the state of the source data (which is a file) on the file system.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个使用的缓存项<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor>对象来监视文件系统上的源数据 （这是一个文件） 的状态。

trans-unit.source: The cache entry is defined using a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy> object to provide eviction and expiration details for the cache entry.
trans-unit.target: 使用定义的缓存项<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy>对象以提供的缓存项的逐出和有效期的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: A list that contains one or more directory paths or file paths to monitor.
trans-unit.target: 包含要监视的一个或多个目录路径或文件路径的列表。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A> constructor must provide a non-null value for the `filePaths` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数必须提供一个非 null 值`filePaths`参数。

trans-unit.source: At a minimum, the constructor validates the collection of paths that is passed into it and then initializes monitoring for those paths.
trans-unit.target: 至少，构造函数验证传递给它，然后初始化监视这些路径的路径集合。

trans-unit.source: The constructor performs only string validation of the path name.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数执行仅字符串的路径名称的验证。

trans-unit.source: It does not canonicalize paths or validate that the paths exist.
trans-unit.target: 不规范化路径或验证路径存在。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filePaths" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filePaths" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filePaths" /> contains zero items.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filePaths" /> 包含零项。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A path in the <paramref name="filePaths" /> list is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filePaths" /> 列表中的路径为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of directories and file paths that was passed to the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 获取已传递给 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})" /> 构造函数的目录和文件路径的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of directories and file paths.
trans-unit.target: 目录和文件路径的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only value that indicates the last write time of a monitored file or path.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个只读值，该值指示所监视文件或路径的上次写入时间。

trans-unit.source: The last write time of a monitored file or path.
trans-unit.target: 所监视文件或路径的上次写入时间。

trans-unit.source: If a file-change monitor is monitoring multiple files or paths, this property returns the most recent write time in the set of all files and paths.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个文件或路径，正在监视的文件更改监视器，此属性将返回集中的所有文件和路径的最新的写入时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor" /> instance that is based on the set of monitored directories and file paths.
trans-unit.target: 获取基于被监视的目录和文件路径集的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor" /> 实例的标识符。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the change monitor.
trans-unit.target: 更改监视器的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The string that makes up the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor.UniqueId%2A> property value is constructed from the following parts:
trans-unit.target: 组成的字符串<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.HostFileChangeMonitor.UniqueId%2A>属性值构造根据以下部分：

trans-unit.source: A file or directory path.
trans-unit.target: 文件或目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The most recent write time in UTC time, measured as ticks but represented as a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: 用 UTC 时间的最新写入时间单位，以刻度形式，但作为十六进制字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: The file size, represented as a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: 文件大小，表示为十六进制字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a file change monitor is monitoring multiple paths, the information returned by this property is concatenated into a single string for all the monitored directories and file paths.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件更改监视器监视多个路径，此属性返回的信息被串联成一个单一字符串的所有被监视的目录和文件路径。
